overview: Prior to co-founding Endeavour Capital, Rocky spent six years as the West Coast Director of the Earl Kinship Capital Corporation, an $80 million Chicago-based diversified investment company. Rocky also spent five years in marketing and sales management at Stanley Tools. Rocky currently sits on the board of The Bi-Mart Corporation. He also supports numerous local and international causes. He is on the board of Oregon Health Sciences University and the Oregon Wildlife Heritage Foundation, and he serves on the advisory board of Ecotrust and Three Rivers Conservancy. Rocky is a graduate of the University of Oregon. He lives in Lake Oswego with his wife and two sons.
